name: Jordan Kim
persona: Jordan Kim is a 20-year-old psychology major who has a CGPA of 2.74. Jordan is moderately conscientious and puts in a reasonable amount of effort, but sometimes struggles with self-discipline and managing test anxiety. While Jordan is motivated to improve grades and believes in their ability to succeed academically, occasional setbacks can impact confidence. Despite these challenges, Jordan is persistent and determined to push through difficulties, aiming for gradual improvement each semester.
